summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Chapter 23.32.016 of the Seattle Municipal Code and the Official Land Use Map at page 114, to rezone six lots located between 1108 and 1128 - 33rd Avenue, from Lowrise 2 (L2) to Neighborhood Commercial 1 with a 30' height limit (NC1 30).(Petition by Tom Flood, C.F. 309121, DPD Project 3008274).
